fields.name: Converting From 2.20.1 and Lower:
fields.value:
1. Stop the server
2. Delete all EssentialsX jars
3. Add the new versions
4. Start the server

fields.name: Converting After Updating:
fields.value:
1. Stop the server
2. Open `/plugins/Essentials/upgrades-done.yml`
3. Change `updateLegacyToAdventure: true` to `false`
4. Start the server
Your message file should have been moved to the newly created `messages` directory and converted to MiniMessage. If for some reason it was not, ask for help.
